com.apriori.concurrent.atoms

Interface SynchronousAtom<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the atom's value
    All Superinterfaces:
    Atom<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleAtom, ThreadLocalAtom, TransactionalAtom

    public interface SynchronousAtom<T>
extends Atom<T>
    An atom whose value is modified synchronously and immediately.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.apriori.concurrent.atoms.Atom

        Atom.Watcher<T>

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods

      Combines the atom's value with the given value, using the given function.
      default T getAndAccumulate(T t, BiFunction<? super T,? super T,? extends T> function)
      Combines the atom's value with the given value, using the given function.

      Applies a function to the atom's value.

      Sets the atom's value to the one specified and returns the previous value.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.apriori.concurrent.atoms.Atom

        addWatcher, get, removeWatcher

    • Method Detail

      • set

        T set(T value)
        Sets the atom's value to the one specified and returns the previous value. Upon changing the value, watchers will be notified.
        Parameters:
        value - the atom's new value
        Returns:
        the atom's previous value

      • updateAndGet

        T updateAndGet(Function<? super T,? extends T> function)
        Applies a function to the atom's value. The atom's new value is the result of applying the specified function to the atom's current value. Watchers are notified when the value is changed.
        Parameters:
        function - the function to apply
        Returns:
        the atom's new value

      • getAndUpdate

        T getAndUpdate(Function<? super T,? extends T> function)
        Applies a function to the atom's value. The atom's new value is the result of applying the specified function to the atom's current value. Watchers are notified when the value is changed.
        Parameters:
        function - the function to apply
        Returns:
        the atom's previous value

      • accumulateAndGet

        default T accumulateAndGet(T t,
                           BiFunction<? super T,? super T,? extends T> function)
        Combines the atom's value with the given value, using the given function. The atom's new value is the result of applying the function. Watchers are notified when the value is changed.
        Parameters:
        t - the value to combine
        function - the function to apply
        Returns:
        the atom's new value

      • getAndAccumulate

        default T getAndAccumulate(T t,
                           BiFunction<? super T,? super T,? extends T> function)
        Combines the atom's value with the given value, using the given function. The atom's new value is the result of applying the function. Watchers are notified when the value is changed.
        Parameters:
        t - the value to combine
        function - the function to apply
        Returns:
        the atom's previous value
